title: SIHH rebrands as Watches and Wonders Geneva, welcoming the public in a bid to woo the ‘now generation’
text:
After 30 years as one of the world’s leading watch shows, Geneva’s Salon International de la Haute Horlogerie (SIHH) is undergoing a major revamp for 2019.

In response to the dawning of a new age for the acquisition of luxury goods, the major watch fairs of the world have been subject to unprecedented change in the past few years. With an emphasis on inclusivity and a global demand for a fast turnaround of information, shows including SIHH and Baselworld have been forced to take a look at how they deliver information, and to whom.
